Gu, Z. spiralize: an R package for Visualizing Data on Spirals. 
  Bioinformatics 2021.
  
World Development Indicators | DataBank. (n.d.). Retrieved from https://databank.worldbank.org/reports.aspx?source=2&series=EN.GHG.CO2.MT.CE.AR5&country=WLD#

```{r}
library(spiralize)
library(lubridate)

data = read.csv("1990-2021.csv", sep = ",")

data$Date = as.Date(data$Date, format = "%d-%m-%Y")

spiral_initialize_by_time(xlim = range(data$Date), unit_on_axis = "months", period = "year",period_per_loop = 12, vp_param = list(x = unit(0, "npc"), just = "left"))
spiral_track(height =  0.8, ylim = c(0, 1000))
spiral_lines(data$Date, data$United.States.USD., area = TRUE, gp = gpar(fill = "red", col = NA))


```
